title: Taking a sebatical
body:
We are doing it! Taking a sabbatical, or at least something like it. We have wanted to slow travel for a while, and 2019 will be the time

#### Hopes:

- **Digital Nomad** - I (Tyler) want to be more scrappy.
- **Learn** - Skills and culture
- **un-burn out** - I have felt so burnt out lately, I can focus when it is time sensitive, or for short periods of times... but if it isn't time sensitive, and it requires long term dedication,...  Fuhgetaboutit
![My feeling toward muscling through important but not time sensitive things](https://media.tenor.com/images/c231296573f458d42ff495e64c0916c5/tenor.gif)

#### Fears:

- **Losing traction in our careers** - Gap on resume, tech scene will pass Tyler by, I will be viewed as flighty
- **Returning to a bad economical situation** - We haven't experienced a real depression
- **Having to eat into savings** - FIRE dream might be dead, but we don't want to dig into 401k or Trad IRA in order to survive.
author: Tyler
